text: Ga hooaga luada, tagi dauwa aamua e hiihai huoloo bolo gi iloo di mee digau o Jew dela ne hagi aga ai a Paul, gei mee gaa hai bolo nia daula baalanga gi wwedee gi daha, gei mee ga haga dagabuli mai nia dagi hai mee dabu, mo digau aamua hai gabunga huogodoo. Gei mee gaa lahi a Paul ga haga duu i mua digaula huogodoo.
